function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 disease","Impact":"Significant impacts on societies and cities around the world","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and health education","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, telemedicine, and vaccine development technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Influence on individuals, communities, organizations, and governments","Impact":"Impacts on every level and scale from global networks and infrastructure to home and work environments","Mitigation":"Effective communication, collaboration, and implementation of public health guidelines","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, remote work technologies, and surveillance systems","People":"General public, organizations, governments","Owner":"Public health agencies, government, private sector"}]}
